title: ForeVR Bowl VR
description:
Whether you are looking for a casual game with friends or rekindling a family rivalry ForeVR Bowl has you covered Explore 8 immersive lanes (The Moon, TIki Hall, Atlantis, & more!) and unlock 150+ unique bowling balls to find your perfect game. Climb the leaderboard and win weekly events and challenges. System of Souls
Choose from 1000s of songs on the YouTube powered Jukebox Bowling solo, online multiplayer, or local pass-and-play will never be the same in VR Pick a side in ‘Versus Mode’ each week to win prizes for your team. Strike a pose with friends and document your Bowling Night fun with the brand new Selfie Cam. Search each hall for unlock-able Hidden Balls.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD 400 Series or higher
